name: calcium acetate
indications: calcium acetate capsule phosphate binder indicated reduction serum phosphorus patients end stage renal disease . ( 1 )
contraindications: starting dose 2 capsules meal . ( 2 ) titrate dose every 2 3 weeks acceptable serum phosphorus level reached . patients require 3 4 capsules meal . ( 2 )
warningsAndPrecautions: calcium acetate capsules , usp blue opaque capsules imprinted `` hp 531 `` oral containing 667 mg calcium acetate ( anhydrous ca ( ch3coo ) 2 ; mw=158.17 grams ) equal 169 mg ( 8.45 meq ) calcium . ndc : 70518-4299-00 packaging : 30 1 blister pack storage : store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15 30°c ( 59 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
indications_original: Calcium acetate capsule is a phosphate binder indicated for the reduction of serum phosphorus in patients with end stage renal disease. ( 1 )
contraindications_original: Starting dose is 2 capsules with each meal. ( 2 ) Titrate the dose every 2 to 3 weeks until acceptable serum phosphorus level is reached. Most patients require 3 to 4 capsules with each meal.( 2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Calcium Acetate Capsules, USP are blue opaque capsules imprinted with "HP 531" for oral administration containing 667 mg calcium acetate (anhydrous Ca(CH3COO)2; MW=158.17 grams) equal to 169 mg (8.45 mEq) calcium.
                  
                  NDC: 70518-4299-00
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  
                  STORAGE:  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15 to 30°C (59 to 86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
